metadata.name: Gemini
metadata.description: Twin Strike: This legend may attack twice per turn while its health is more than 15.

metadata.name: Zeus
metadata.description: God of the Skies and Thunder: When activated, add a ‘Lightning Bolt’ card from your deck or adrenaline stack to your hand.

metadata.name: Icarus
metadata.description: Wax wings: reduce all incoming damage by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

metadata.name: Jeanne d'Arc
metadata.description: Visions: When activated, look at the top card of the opponent's deck. This can be used as a retaliation.

metadata.name: Basilisk
metadata.description: Shed Skin: Spend all adrenaline (at least 2) to restore health by 5.

metadata.name: Godzilla
metadata.description: Overpower: When activated, spend adrenaline to gain attack equal to the amount spent until the end of the turn.

metadata.name: Alucard
metadata.description: Shape-Shifter: Spend 1 adrenaline to activate. If you do, shuffle your hand into the deck and draw cards equal to how many cards you shuffled in.

metadata.name: Dracula
metadata.description: Draining: When activated, move up to 2 cards from an opponent’s adrenaline stack to their void.

metadata.name: Strix
metadata.description: Bloodlust: When activated, steal 1 health from an opponent’s Legend.
